formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'MUSICCLASS' =-
[Syntax] MUSICCLASS()
[Synopsis] Read or Set the MusicOnHold class
[Description] Deprecated. Use CHANNEL(musicclass) instead.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -7,4 +7,4 @@ Read or Set the MusicOnHold class
[Description] - This function will read or set the music on hold class for a channel. + Deprecated. Use CHANNEL(musicclass) instead.
